id.description: The unique identifier of the metadata

name.description: The name associated with the metadata

url.description: The URL associated with the metadata

impressions.description: The number of times the campaign was viewed

clicks.description: The number of clicks on the campaign

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions across all metrics

conversions.description: The number of conversions generated by the campaign

viewConversions.description: The number of conversions generated by video views

spend.description: The total spend on the campaign

ecpc.description: The effective cost per click for the campaign

ctr.description: The click-through rate of the campaign

conversionRate.description: The conversion rate of the campaign

viewConversionRate.description: The conversion rate of video views

cpa.description: The cost per acquisition for the campaign

totalCpa.description: The total cost per acquisition across all metrics

totalSumValue.description: The total sum value across all metrics

sumValue.description: The sum value of a specific metric

viewSumValue.description: The sum value of a specific metric for video views

totalAverageValue.description: The total average value of all metrics

averageValue.description: The average value of a specific metric

viewAverageValue.description: The average value of a specific metric for video views

totalRoas.description: The total return on ad spend across all metrics

roas.description: The return on ad spend for the campaign

videoReachedFirstQ.description: The number of times video content reached the first quartile

videoReachedSecondQ.description: The number of times video content reached the second quartile

videoReachedThirdQ.description: The number of times video content reached the third quartile

videoReachedCompletion.description: The number of times video content reached completion

videoViewDuration.description: The total view duration of video content

videoAvgViewDuration.description: The average view duration of video content

videoPlays.description: The number of times video content was played

clicksOnVideo.description: The number of clicks on video content

videoActiveCompletionsPercentage.description: The percentage of active video completions

marketer_id.description: The unique identifier of the marketer associated with the campaign

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign
